thread.title: Rafizi: Opposition out of touch, condescending
thread.title_full: Rafizi: Opposition out of touch, condescending

title: Rafizi: Opposition out of touch, condescending
text:
More 
PKR parliamentarian Rafizi Ramli has explained what he believes may be the reason why most Malaysians are reluctant to vote for the opposition. 
One reason, he said, would be a question of credibility. Therefore, it is important for the opposition to move away from being seen as opportunistic, he said. 
“Why do we lack credibility? We have been out of touch, to the point of being condescending,” said Rafizi during his presentation at the Save Malaysia roundtable discussion held in Bandar Utama today.
